sen.j: 田口 俊平（たぐち しゅんぺい、文化 (元号)15年（1818年） - 慶応3年（1867年）11月）は、幕末期の砲術、測量術の技術者。
sen.e: Shunpei TAGUCHI (1818 - November, 1867) was a engineer of gunnery and surveying in the end of Edo period.

sen.e: Although he was born in a family of the only doctor in a village in mountain area, he advanced his career to 'hatamoto' (direct retainers of the bakufu, which is a form of Japanese feudal government headed by a shogun).

sen.j: 測量術、砲術、蘭学、機械工学などを学び、幕末の時代に多くの門弟を指導し、幕末における日本の近代化への貢献が大きかった。
sen.e: He studied surveying, gunnery, Western studies, and Mechanical Engineering, etc., taught many disciples, and significantly contributed to modernization of Japan in the end of Edo period.

sen.e: For his great achievement, he was raised to Jugoinojo (Junior Fifth Rank, Upper Grade) after his death in 1928.
